issue.title: [Docs] Add note about "Feather" to the IPC file format document
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17092](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17092). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The IPC file format is often referred to as Feather (especially in relation to Python and R), but beginners are confused because the word "Feather" does not appear on the IPC file format documentation.
https://arrow.apache.org/docs/format/Columnar.html#ipc-file-format

Note: This ticket was created as a result of a conversation with `[~kou]` on Twitter.
https://twitter.com/eitsupi/status/1547534742324920321

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17092?focusedCommentId=17572234) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13693
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13693>
